events.message: I recently received my order but I want to return the product because it does not meet my expectations. How can I get a refund?
The customer's request involves a refund and product return, so the case is categorized under Refund.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request and provide assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I'm here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want to return the product so we can process the refund quickly?
My order number is 123456789, and I am returning it because the item looked different from the pictures and did not work as expected.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund. Please use the prepaid return label we will email you shortly to send the item back.
Thanks for your quick response and for providing a return label. I will send it back today.
We have issued the return label to your email. Once the product is received, we will process your refund immediately.
Just following up to confirm that you have sent the product back and if you have received your refund yet.
Yes, I sent the product back yesterday and received the refund this morning. Thank you for your help.
We are glad your issue was resolved. Closing the case now. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
A short survey has been sent to you to rate your experience with our support team.
